name: COMMUNITY-MANAGED IRRIGATED AGRICULTURE SECTOR PROJ-ADDL FINANCIN
info: Additional financing will continue to focus on rehabilitating and extending the irrigation coverage of farmer-managed irrigation systems in the central and eastern development regions. It will also support the rehabilitation of select irrigation systems that are currently receiving direct government support; the management will be transferred to WUAs after system development and WUA strengthening. The project will be implemented through about 70 community-based subprojects.
